column1: in memory ofbrion e. woods 1953 - 2015 | brion e. woods
column6: 1953 to the late marjorie and arthur woods in toledo
column7: ohio. brion worked as a boiler maker for over 35 years. he retired from hans hansons industries inc. brion enjoyed being outdoors
column8: especially hunting and fishing. left to cherish his memory are his daughters
column9: beyea (todd) nowakowski and brooke (howard) krell; siblings
column11: bruce woods and linda (rex) kline; grandchildren
column12: miela and dane nowakowski and maylee and georgia krell. a memorial service will be held on saturday
column14: 2015 at 11:00 a. m. at brions home. newcomer funeral home assisted the family with professional services (419-381-1900).
